name: Misfortune in the Galaxy
description:
Become a Junior Spaceship Operator and make efforts to keep your spaceship working. Hurry up with repairs to not let the spaceship explode!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse - look around

Left mouse button - grab item

Right mouse button - drop item

Mouse scroll - switch between first and second item in your hands

Authors:

Rafał Fornalik

Karol Mikołajko

Aleksander Filek
